I've heard that the Argons are back in Exodor.

You'll have to get stronger if you're going to fight them.
Come to the Blacksmith's Workshop.

Goddess Kaia.

When the goddess Kaia learned of the situation in Exodor she was disturbed, sensing Balder's power in Azart's items and the Argons.

She recognized that the source of this power was an artificial sun, and devised a way of extracting the power in order to make powerful weapons from it.

A teleportal leading to the Blacksmith's Workshop.

Make sure you're ready.

The Argons are back!
Why didn't you tell me about this right away, ?!

I was convinced that we'd driven them out once and for all... and now they're turning Kelsaik into an Argon just to make our lives difficult! This is really infuriating!

They're very strong, which is why I sent for you; I want to give you some powerful equipment."What kind of equipment?"

With Sikander's help, I've built a new anvil.

Any equipment made using this anvil is stronger than ordinary equipment.
Aren't you curious how strong this new equipment is?
Talk to Fovarth to find out more.

The anvil was forged in a flame ignited by Kaia's power!

Using this anvil, it's now possible to craft new equipment that has Kaia's power vested within it.

Check you've got the necessary materials to make the equipment.
